sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
import {ChakraProvider, Box, Flex, Text, Container, Stack, Input, InputGroup, InputLeftElement, PhoneIcon, Spacer } from '@chakra-ui/react'
import { Helmet, HelmetProvider } from 'react-helmet-async';

const Sidebar = () => {
    const sticky = {
        position: "-webkit-sticky", /* Safari */
        position: "sticky",
        top: "0"
    };

    const sidebarBorder = {
        borderBottom: "1px solid #38444D",
    };

    return (
        <HelmetProvider>
            <Helmet>
                <title>Home / Twitter</title>
            </Helmet>
            <ChakraProvider>
                <Box w="350px" h="80vh" style={sticky}>
                    <Stack direction="column" mt="5px" spacing="15px">
                        <Box>
                            <Input placeholder="Search Twitter" borderColor="#253341" w="350px" h="42px" bg="#253341" borderRadius="20px" color="#8899A6"/>
                        </Box>
                        <Box w="350px" h="438px" bg="#192734" borderRadius="15px">
                            <Box h="45px" style={sidebarBorder}> {/* Rapih */}
                                <Stack direction="row" p="2">
                                    <Box>
                                        <Text fontSize="19px" fontWeight="800" color="white" ml="10px">Trends for you</Text>
                                    </Box>
                                    <Spacer />
                                    <Box>
                                        <Box w="20px" h="20px" bg="tomato" mt="5px" mr="10px"></Box>
                                    </Box>
                                </Stack>
                            </Box>
                            <Box h="85px" style={sidebarBorder} p="2" _hover={{ bg: "#1A90D9" }}>
                                <Stack direction="row">
                                    <Box>
                                        <Stack direction="column" spacing="0px" ml="10px">
                                            <Text fontSize="13px" color="#8899A6">Trending in Indonesia</Text>
                                            <Text fontSize="15px" color="white" fontWeight="bold">#ILHAM</Text>
                                            <Text fontSize="13px" color="#8899A6" pt="5px">15.7K Tweets</Text>
                                        </Stack>
                                    </Box>
                                    <Spacer />
                                    <Box>
                                        <Box w="20px" h="10px" bg="gray.50" mt="5px" mr="10px"></Box>
                                    </Box>
                                </Stack>
                            </Box>
                            <Box h="85px" style={sidebarBorder} p="2">
                                <Stack direction="row">
                                    <Box>
                                        <Stack direction="column" spacing="0px" ml="10px">
                                            <Text fontSize="13px" color="#8899A6">Trending in Indonesia</Text>
                                            <Text fontSize="15px" color="white" fontWeight="bold">#ILHAM</Text>
                                            <Text fontSize="13px" color="#8899A6" pt="5px">15.7K Tweets</Text>
                                        </Stack>
                                    </Box>
                                    <Spacer />
                                    <Box>
                                        <Box w="20px" h="10px" bg="gray.50" mt="5px" mr="10px"></Box>
                                    </Box>
                                </Stack>
                            </Box>
                            <Box h="85px" style={sidebarBorder} p="2">
                                <Stack direction="row">
                                    <Box>
                                        <Stack direction="column" spacing="0px" ml="10px">
                                            <Text fontSize="13px" color="#8899A6">Trending in Indonesia</Text>
                                            <Text fontSize="15px" color="white" fontWeight="bold">#ILHAM</Text>
                                            <Text fontSize="13px" color="#8899A6" pt="5px">15.7K Tweets</Text>
                                        </Stack>
                                    </Box>
                                    <Spacer />
                                    <Box>
                                        <Box w="20px" h="10px" bg="gray.50" mt="5px" mr="10px"></Box>
                                    </Box>
                                </Stack>
                            </Box>
                            <Box h="85px" style={sidebarBorder} p="2">
                                <Stack direction="row">
                                    <Box>
                                        <Stack direction="column" spacing="0px" ml="10px">
                                            <Text fontSize="13px" color="#8899A6">Trending in Indonesia</Text>
                                            <Text fontSize="15px" color="white" fontWeight="bold">#ILHAM</Text>
                                            <Text fontSize="13px" color="#8899A6" pt="5px">15.7K Tweets</Text>
                                        </Stack>
                                    </Box>
                                    <Spacer />
                                    <Box>
                                        <Box w="20px" h="10px" bg="gray.50" mt="5px" mr="10px"></Box>
                                    </Box>
                                </Stack>
                            </Box>
                            <Box h="52px" p="2">
                                <Text fontSize="15px" color="#1DA1F2" ml="10px" mt="5px">Show more</Text>
                            </Box>
                        </Box>

                        <Box w="350px" h="236px" bg="#192734" borderRadius="15px">
                            <Box h="45px" style={sidebarBorder}>
                                <Stack direction="row" p="2">
                                    <Box>
                                        <Text fontSize="19px" fontWeight="800" color="white" ml="10px">Who to follow</Text>
                                    </Box>
                                </Stack>
                            </Box>
                            <Box h="70px" style={sidebarBorder} p="2">
                                <Stack direction="row" ml="10px">
                                    <Box>
                                        <Stack direction="row">
                                            <Box>
                                                <Box w="50px" h="50px" bg="gray.50" borderRadius="100%" />
                                            </Box>
                                            <Box>
                                                <Stack direction="column" spacing="-5px" mt="5px">
                                                    <Text fontSize="15px" fontWeight="bold" color="white">Rido Nursyahid</Text>
                                                    <Text fontSize="15px" color="#8899A6">@rido_muttaqin</Text>
                                                </Stack>
                                            </Box>
                                        </Stack>
                                    </Box>
                                    <Spacer />
                                    <Box>
                                        <Box w="80px" h="30px" bg="tomato" mt="5px" mr="10px" />
                                    </Box>
                                </Stack>
                            </Box>
                            <Box h="70px" style={sidebarBorder} p="2">
                                <Stack direction="row" ml="10px">
                                    <Box>
                                        <Stack direction="row">
                                            <Box>
                                                <Box w="50px" h="50px" bg="gray.50" borderRadius="100%" />
                                            </Box>
                                            <Box>
                                                <Stack direction="column" spacing="-5px" mt="5px">
                                                    <Text fontSize="15px" fontWeight="bold" color="white">Rido Nursyahid</Text>
                                                    <Text fontSize="15px" color="#8899A6">@rido_muttaqin</Text>
                                                </Stack>
                                            </Box>
                                        </Stack>
                                    </Box>
                                    <Spacer />
                                    <Box>
                                        <Box w="80px" h="30px" bg="tomato" mt="5px" mr="10px" />
                                    </Box>
                                </Stack>
                            </Box>
                            <Box h="52px" p="2">
                                <Text fontSize="15px" color="#1DA1F2" ml="10px" mt="5px">Show more</Text>
                            </Box>
                        </Box>

                        <Box>
                            <Stack direction="row" ml="10px">
                                <Text fontSize="13px" color="#8899A6">Terms of Service</Text>
                                <Text fontSize="13px" color="#8899A6">Privacy Policy</Text>
                                <Text fontSize="13px" color="#8899A6">Cookie Policy</Text>
                            </Stack>
                            <Stack direction="row" ml="10px">
                                <Text fontSize="13px" color="#8899A6">Ads info</Text>
                                <Text fontSize="13px" color="#8899A6">More</Text>
                                <Text fontSize="13px" color="#8899A6"> 2021 Twitter, Inc.</Text>
                            </Stack>
                        </Box>
                    </Stack>
                </Box>
            </ChakraProvider>
        </HelmetProvider>
    )
}

export default Sidebar
